COndor::

"The Mighty Decepticons dissapeared 300 human years ago, according 
with their calendar" replied Condor and he added " and Thanks for 
your nice advice... " and the male thought " but I won't be with your 
kind company so long" as soon he heard a bout Triggerhappy Condor 
looked him and said "I'm very sorry that I can't say nice to meet 
you... I have the right at last to know what do you want of me"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> OOC: Triggerhappy, Blowpipe and Astroblast. Triggerhappy and 
> Blowpipe have their weapons trained on Condor, and Astroblast is 
> the spaceship.
> 
> "SILENCE Maximal dirt. We are not part of that idiot Predacon 
> faction, we are the mighty Decepticons." Astroblast ends with a 
> thunder through the speaker system. "You, are a prisoner. Any 
> attempts at escape are futile, and you will be punished, or 
> terminated if necessary if you even try anything. This," A silence 
> gives the idea that Astroblast is talking about Triggerhappy 
> becomes apparent, "Is Triggerhappy. He will be happy to pull the 
> trigger of his gun into your head if you give him the any reason 
to."
> 
> On 22 Feb 2001, at 5:24, airly2000@y... wrote:
> 
> > OOC: Who's with COndor? 
> > 
> > Condor::
> > 
> > "Hey you Brainless bot, is it the way to fight for Predacons????" 
> > Shouted Condor
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> > > Menasor looks around confused, "Grab other Maximal?" he pulled 
out 
> > his
> > > Cyclone gun, and blasted at Hot Rod, then noticed Firearm 
spinning,
> > > "Maximal spinning out of control" he then fires at Firearm.
